ProductInfo.Features:
17.3" FHD 16:9 "Glare Type" Super Clear Ultra Bright LED Glossy Sager Screen w/ 90% NTSC Color Gamut (1920x1080) / 	 Intel® CoreTM i7-4930K, 3.4-3.9GHz (22nm, 12MB L3 smart cache - 6 cores / 12 threads)
NVIDIA® QuadroTM K5100M (8.0GB) GDDR5 PCI-Express DX11 - The newest NVIDIA® Quadro® mobile professional graphics solutions are true technological breakthroughs, featuring at least double the count of NVIDIA® CUDA® cores of previous generations. Experience professional-class GPUs which integrate high-performance computing capabilities with advanced visualization techniques to transform modern work-flows.
16GB DDR3 1600MHz [4x4GB] Quad Channel Memory /  250GB Samsung 840 EVO Series SSD OS Drive [SATA III] + 750GB 7200RPM [SATA II - 16MB Cache]
8X Super Multi DVDRW/CDRW Combo Drive (Dual Layer w/ Software) /  Built-in 802.11 Wireless B/G/N - Stock Wireless Card + BluetoothTM 4.0
Windows 8.1 - 64-Bit (64-Bit CD Included) + MS Office 2013 Trial / 1 Year manufacturers warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Sager NP9570 (Built on Clevo P570WM) i7-4930X (3.0-3.9GHz) / NVIDIA® QuadroTM K5100M (8.0GB) GDDR5 PCI-Express DX11 / 240GB Samsung 840 Evo SSD
